page_content:
Vysiion Ltd

Basic Managed VM

Customers can utilise the Basic Managed VM service to provide routine provisioning and management of Windows and Linux OS. Clients can focus higher up the VM/OS management layer

Features

  • Assisted deployment of Windows and Linux OS
  • Facilitates patch management of core OS
  • Provision and maintenance of antivirus platform
  • Backup and recovery of entire virtual machines
  • Monitoring across availability, capacity and performance
  • Assistance with Organisational Virtual Data Centre

Benefits

  • Reduces the burden of routine management and maintenance of VMS
  • Replace not repair approach to fault remediation
  • Solutions benefit from more advanced Application Management provider

Pricing

£220 per virtual machine per month

  • Excluding VAT
  • Minimum contract period: Other
